Value.label: Switching additional CONNECT radio receivers
Value.Help: To configure if other radio receivers from Merten should be switched as well.

Value.label: Changeover delay (motor protection)
Value.Help: To configure the time the motor waits before switching direction.

Value.label: Raising time input 1
Value.Help: To configure input 1 of the raising time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec

Value.label: Raising time input 2
Value.Help: To configure input 1 of the raising time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec

Value.label: Lowering time input 1
Value.Help: To configure input 1 of the lowering time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec

Value.label: Lowering time input 2
Value.Help: To configure input 1 of the lowering time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec

Value.label: Light sensor
Value.Help: To configure use of light sensor. Default: 0 .

Value.label: Brightness threshold for light sensor
Value.Help: To configure brightness threshold for light sensor.

Value.label: Sensor raising reaction threshold input 1
Value.Help: To configure input 1 of reaction threshold for raising shutter time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec

Value.label: Sensor raising reaction threshold input 1
Value.Help: To configure input 2 of reaction threshold for raising shutter time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec

Value.label: Sensor lowering reaction threshold input 1
Value.Help: To configure input 1 of reaction threshold for lowering shutter time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec

Value.label: Sensor lowering reaction threshold input 1
Value.Help: To configure input 2 of reaction threshold for lowering shutter time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec
